message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $750,000. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort you've put into finding a fair price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $650,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to consider a compromise. My counteroffer is $700,000 for the product. I hope this proposal allows us to move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
